trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell cmdlet

trans-unit.source: Remove-TypeData
trans-unit.target: Remove-TypeData

trans-unit.source: Remove-TypeData
trans-unit.target: Remove-TypeData

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 简述

trans-unit.source: Deletes extended types from the current session
trans-unit.target: 从当前会话中删除扩展类型

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 语法

trans-unit.source: RemoveTypeDataSet (Default)
trans-unit.target: RemoveTypeDataSet （默认值）

trans-unit.source: RemoveTypeSet
trans-unit.target: RemoveTypeSet

trans-unit.source: RemoveFileSet
trans-unit.target: RemoveFileSet

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: The **Remove-TypeData** cmdlet deletes extended type data from the current session.
trans-unit.target: **Remove-typedata** cmdlet 从当前会话中删除扩展的类型数据。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet affects only the current session and sessions that are created in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 只影响当前会话和当前会话中创建的会话。

trans-unit.source: You can add properties and methods to objects in Windows PowerShell by defining them in Update-TypeData commands and Types.ps1xml files.
trans-unit.target: 您可以添加到 Windows PowerShell 中的对象的属性和方法，方法是在 Update-typedata 命令和 Types.ps1xml 文件中定义它们。

trans-unit.source: **Remove-TypeData** deletes those extended properties and methods from the current session.
trans-unit.target: **Remove-typedata** 从当前会话中删除的扩展的属性和方法。

trans-unit.source: **Remove-TypeData** does not delete the Types.ps1xml files or delete any extended type definitions from the Types.ps1xml files.
trans-unit.target: **Remove-typedata** 不会删除 Types.ps1xml 文件或 Types.ps1xml 文件中删除任何扩展的类型定义。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Types.ps1xml files, see about_Types.ps1xml (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113274).
trans-unit.target: 有关 Types.ps1xml 文件的详细信息，请参阅 about_Types.ps1xml (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113274)。

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet is introduced in Windows PowerShell 3.0.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 是在 Windows PowerShell 3.0 中引入的。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: Example 1
trans-unit.target: 示例 1

trans-unit.source: This command deletes from the session all type data for the System.Array type, including type data that was added by a Types.ps1xml file and dynamic type data that was added to the session by using the Update-TypeData cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此命令删除从会话中返回的所有类型 System.Array 类型，包括通过 Types.ps1xml 文件添加的类型数据和与使用 Update-typedata cmdlet 添加到会话的动态类型数据的数据。

trans-unit.source: Example 2
trans-unit.target: 示例 2

trans-unit.source: This command shows the effect of removing extended type data from a session.
trans-unit.target: 此命令演示了从会话中删除扩展类型数据的效果。

trans-unit.source: Example 3
trans-unit.target: 示例 3

trans-unit.source: This command removes all extended type data for module objects.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将删除模块对象的所有扩展类型数据。

trans-unit.source: When you pipe an object to **Remove-TypeData**, **Remove-TypeData** gets the name of the object type and removes all type data for all objects of that type.
trans-unit.target: 当通过管道传递一个对象到 **Remove-typedata**, ，**Remove-typedata** 获取的对象类型的名称并删除该类型的所有对象的所有类型数据。

trans-unit.source: Example 4
trans-unit.target: 示例 4

trans-unit.source: This command uses the **Path** parameter of the **Remove-TypeData** cmdlet to remove the extended types that are defined in the Types.ps1xml files that are added by the **PSScheduledJob** and **PSWorkflow** modules.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用 **路径** 参数 **Remove-typedata** cmdlet 可删除由添加的 Types.ps1xml 文件中定义的扩展的类型 **PSScheduledJob** 和 **PSWorkflow** 模块。

trans-unit.source: This command does not affect dynamic type data that is added by using the Update-TypeData cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此命令不会影响使用 Update-typedata cmdlet 添加的动态类型数据。

trans-unit.source: The command succeeds only when the modules have been imported into the current session.
trans-unit.target: 仅当已将模块导入当前会话时，此命令才能够成功执行。

trans-unit.source: For more information about modules, see about_Modules (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144311).
trans-unit.target: 有关模块的详细信息，请参阅 about_Modules (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144311)。

trans-unit.source: Example 5
trans-unit.target: 示例 5

trans-unit.source: This command removes extended types from a remote session.
trans-unit.target: 此命令将从远程会话中删除扩展类型。

trans-unit.source: The command uses the Invoke-Command cmdlet to remove extended type data for all CIM types in the sessions in the $s variable.
trans-unit.target: 该命令使用 Invoke-command cmdlet 在 $s 变量中的会话中删除所有 CIM 类型的扩展的类型数据。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 参数

trans-unit.source: -Path
trans-unit.target: -Path

trans-unit.source: Deletes from the session extended type data that is defined in the specified files.
trans-unit.target: 从会话中删除在指定文件中定义的扩展类型数据。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Enter the paths and file names of one or more Types.ps1xml files.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个或多个 Types.ps1xml 文件的路径和文件名。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: If you omit the path, the default location is the current directory.
trans-unit.target: 如果省略路径，则默认位置为当前目录。

trans-unit.source: -TypeData
trans-unit.target: -TypeData

trans-unit.source: Delete the specified type data from the session.
trans-unit.target: 从会话中删除指定类型数据。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is required.
trans-unit.target: 此参数是必需的。

trans-unit.source: Enter a variable that contains **TypeData** objects (**System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.TypeData**) or a command that gets **TypeData** objects, such as a **Get-TypeData** command.
trans-unit.target: 输入一个包含变量 **TypeData** 对象 (**System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.TypeData**) 或一个可获取命令 **TypeData** 对象，如 **Get-typedata** 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can also pipe **TypeData** objects to **Remove-TypeData**.
trans-unit.target: 您还可以通过管道 **TypeData** 对象添加到 **Remove-typedata**。

trans-unit.source: -TypeName
trans-unit.target: 的类型名称

trans-unit.source: Deletes all extended type data for the specified types.
trans-unit.target: 删除指定类型的所有扩展类型数据。

trans-unit.source: For types in the System namespace, enter the short name.
trans-unit.target: 对于 System 命名空间中的类型，请输入其短名称。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the full type name is required.
trans-unit.target: 否则，必须输入完整类型名称。

trans-unit.source: Wildcards are not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支持使用通配符。

trans-unit.source: You can pipe type names to **Remove-TypeData**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道传递类型名称传递给 **Remove-typedata**。

trans-unit.source: When you pipe an object to **Remove-TypeData**, **Remove-TypeData** gets the type name of the object and removes all type data for the object type.
trans-unit.target: 当通过管道传递一个对象到 **Remove-typedata**, ，**Remove-typedata** 获取该对象的类型名称并删除对对象类型的所有类型数据。

trans-unit.source: -Confirm
trans-unit.target: -Confirm

trans-unit.source: Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.Prompts you for confirmation before running the cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。将提示您在运行 cmdlet 前进行确认。

trans-unit.source: -WhatIf
trans-unit.target: -WhatIf

trans-unit.source: Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 显示如果运行 cmdlet 则会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.Shows what would happen if the cmdlet runs.
trans-unit.target: 该 cmdlet 不会运行。显示在 cmdlet 运行时，会发生什么情况。

trans-unit.source: The cmdlet is not run.
trans-unit.target: cmdlet 未运行。

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 支持以下常见参数:-调试-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction、-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 和-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输入

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.TypeData
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.Runspaces.TypeData

trans-unit.source: You can pipe **TypeData** object, such as the ones that the Get-TypeData cmdlet returns, to **Remove-TypeData**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道传递 **TypeData** 对象，如 Get-typedata cmdlet 返回时，为那些 **Remove-typedata**。

trans-unit.source: System.String
trans-unit.target: System.String

trans-unit.source: You can pipe the type names to **Remove-TypeData**.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过管道传递类型名称传递给 **Remove-typedata**。

trans-unit.source: When you pipe an object to **Remove-TypeData**, **Remove-TypeData** gets the type name of the object and removes all type data for the object type.
trans-unit.target: 当通过管道传递一个对象到 **Remove-typedata**, ，**Remove-typedata** 获取该对象的类型名称并删除对对象类型的所有类型数据。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 输出

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet does not generate any output.
trans-unit.target: 此 cmdlet 将不生成任何输出。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 说明

trans-unit.source: **Remove-TypeData** can remove only the extended type data in the current session.
trans-unit.target: **Remove-typedata** 可以在当前会话中删除的扩展的类型数据。

trans-unit.source: It cannot remove extended type data that is on the computer, but has not been added to the current session, such as extended types that are defined in modules that have not been imported into the current session.
trans-unit.target: 它无法删除位于计算机上的但未添加到当前会话的扩展类型数据，例如模块中定义的但未导入到当前会话中的扩展类型数据。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相关的链接

trans-unit.source: Get-TypeData
trans-unit.target: Get-TypeData

trans-unit.source: Update-TypeData
trans-unit.target: Update-TypeData

trans-unit.target: about_Types.ps1xml
